content: autumn leaves linier top light as air super soft and drapey this top is flattering to most figures and is quick and easy to knit suitable as an introduction to lace for advanced beginners it will become your favourite for between seasons yarn and materials  200g cloud forest yarns fingering weight / 4 ply yarn or similar  4mm & 4 5mm needles straight or circular  yarn needle to sew in ends sizing this top is easily adjustable as written the sample is approx 40cm long and 100cm wide when blocked gauge gauge is not terribly important so don t worry if it s a bit out approx 24st x 30rows on 4mm needles in stocking stitch abbreviations st/sts stitch / stitches rs / ws right side / wrong side k1 knit one stitch p1 purl one stitch yo wrap yarn around right needle once to create new stitch s2kp slip 2 sts together knitwise knit 1 pass the slipped stitches over the knitted stitch 2 pattern  cast on 172 sts on 4 5mm needles  change to 4mm needles and knit all sts of the first 2 row  from here you will be knitting the autumn leaves lace pattern shown below autumn leaves lace pattern row 1 rs p1 k1 *k4 s2kp k4 yo k1 yo* repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 2 and every ws row p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 3 - p1 k1 *k3 s2kp k3 yo k3 yo* repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 4 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 5 - p1 k1 *k2 s2kp k2 yo k5 yo* repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 6 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 7 - p1 k1 *k1 s2kp k1 yo k7 yo* repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 8 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 9 - p1 k1 *s2kp yo k9 yo* repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 10 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 11 p1 k1 * yo k1 yo k4 s2kp k4 * repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 12 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 13 p1 k1 * yo k3 yo k3 s2kp k3 * repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 14 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 15 p1 k1 * yo k5 yo k2 s2kp k2 * repeat from * to * 14 times k1 p1 row 16 - p1 k1 p all sts until last 2 sts k1 p1 row 17 p1 k1 * yo k7 yo k1 s2kp k1 * repeat from
